AT.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
AT.description: Kämpfe dich durch viele bunte Level in „Kirby’s Blowout Blast“, einem rasanten 3D-Action-Puzzler! Kämpfe dich durch über 25 Stages, die sich bequem unterwegs spielen lassen, und erziele einen möglichst hohen Highscore! Sauge deine Gegner auf, dann wirf sie auf andere Gegner – und erhalte dafür jede Menge Punkte! Je mehr Gegner du aufsaugst, desto mehr Feuerkraft erhältst du! Lass einen mächtigen Durchschlagstern auf deine Gegner los, um ganze Truppen von Bösewichten auf einmal zu beseitigen, oder mache einem einzigen Gegner mit einem flotten Wurfstern das Leben schwer. Um einen besonders hohen Highscore zu erreichen, musst du mehrere Angriffe aneinanderreihen! Erlebe aufregende Bosskämpfe gegen grimmige Gegner aus dem Kirby-Universum! Unter amiibo.nintendo.eu findest du eine Liste kompatibler amiibo™ und aktuelle Informationen. Um amiibo auf Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- und Nintendo 2DS-Systemen zu benutzen, wird ein Nintendo 3DS-NFC-Lese-/Schreibgerät benötigt.

AU.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
AU.description: Blast your way through a variety of colourful levels in Kirby’s Blowout Blast, a fast-paced 3D action-puzzler! Fight through over 25 bite-sized stages, perfect for playing on the go, and aim for the highest scores you can muster. Inhale any enemies you encounter, then spit them out when the time is right to bash other bad guys – and rack up the points! The more meanies you inhale, the more firepower you’ll wield! Unleash a powerful Blaster Bullet to wipe out entire troops of wrongdoers all at once, or take out a single foe with a quick fire Star Bullet – you’ll need to chain combos to achieve the highest scores! Experience larger-than-life boss battles, as troublesome fiends from the Kirby universe return to cause havoc. Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BR.name: Kirby’s Blowout Blast™
BR.description: O Kirby está pronto para a aventura em uma nova dimensão – a terceira dimensão! Divirta-se inalando e soprando inimigos em ambientes 3D em mais de 25 fases. Inale bastante inimigos e você poderá lançar uma Blaster Bullet enorme, capaz de dizimar uma tropa de Waddle Dees. Esta é a sua chance de enfrentar chefões como Kracko Jr e o rei Dedede em 3D! Inalar vários inimigos para lançar Blaster Bullets é uma ótima maneira de aumentar a sua pontuação e conseguir uma estrela de bronze, prata ou ouro. Outro jeito de pontuar bastante é realizar combos atirando em inimigos sem errar. Ou apenas colete moedas ao saltar as plataformas. Enquanto progride, você vai desbloquear fases EX, que apresentam desafios mais difíceis de dominar. Comemore suas vitórias tocando com uma figura amiibo™ da série Kirby para construir uma estátua na praça. Ela vai tocar uma nova música!

BG.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
BG.description: Blast your way through a variety of colourful levels in Kirby’s Blowout Blast, a fast-paced 3D action-puzzler! Fight through over 25 bite-sized stages, perfect for playing on the go, and aim for the highest scores you can muster. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BE.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
BE.description: Traversez une variété de niveaux hauts en couleurs dans Kirby’s Blowout Blast, un jeu d'action rapide en 3D ! Combattez à travers 25 stages qui représentent un moyen idéal de s'amuser lors de vos déplacements, et tentez d'atteindre les meilleurs scores possibles ! Gobez tous les ennemis que vous rencontrez et recrachez-les le temps voulu lorsque le moment de battre d'autres ennemis se présentera pour rafler des points ! Plus vous goberez d'ennemis, plus votre puissance de feu sera décuplée ! Libérez un tir puissant pour dégommer des troupes de méchants entières d'un seul coup, ou débarrassez-vous d'un seul ennemi avec un tir stellaire. Il vous faudra enchaîner les combos pour atteindre le meilleur score ! Affrontez des boss plus puissants que jamais et des ennemis issus de l'univers Kirby qui sont de retour pour semer le chaos. Visitez le site amiibo.nintendo.eu pour voir la liste des amiibo™ compatibles et en savoir plus. Un lecteur/enregistreur NFC est nécessaire pour utiliser les amiibo avec les consoles Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL et Nintendo 2DS.

CA.name: Kirby’s Blowout Blast™
CA.description: Kirby is ready for action in a whole different dimension—the third dimension! Have a blast inhaling foes and blowing them away in 3D environments across 25+ stages. Inhale enough enemies and you can launch one huge Blaster Bullet capable of wiping out a troop of Waddle Dees. Now’s your chance to battle iconic bosses like Kracko Jr and King Dedede in 3D! Inhaling multiple enemies to launch Blaster Bullets is a great way to pump up your score and go for a bronze, silver, or gold star. Another way to score big is to rack up a combo by continuously firing at enemies without missing. Or you could always just collect coins as you jump across platforms. As you progress, you’ll unlock EX stages, which provide a tougher challenge to master. Celebrate your victories by tapping a Kirby series amiibo™ figure to build a statue in the plaza that plays new music!

ES.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
ES.description: Ábrete paso por variedad de coloridas fases en Kirby's Blowout Blast, un juego rápido de acción y puzles 3D. Lucha en 25 fases cortas, perfectas para jugar fuera de casa, e intenta conseguir la mejor puntuación posible. Absorbe cualquier enemigo que te encuentres y escúpelo cuando lo necesites para acabar con otros enemigos. Cuantos más malos absorbas, más poder de disparo tendrás. Libera una potente bala penetrante para devastar con tropas enteras de enemigos de una sola vez o enfréntate a un solo enemigo con la rápida bala estelar. Para alcanzar las puntuaciones más altas tendrás que encadenar combos. Lucha contra imponentes jefes y granujas del universo Kirby que vuelven para desatar el caos. Visita amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar la lista de amiibo™ compatibles y la información más reciente. El lector/grabador de NFC para Nintendo 3DS estará disponible más adelante este año.

HK.name: Kirby's Blowout Blast™ (英文版)
HK.description: 卡比準備在全新的三維空間行動! 在橫跨25關卡以上的3D環境下盡情吸入及吹走敵人。吸入足夠的敵人你就可以發動巨大的Blaster Bullet去清除Waddle Dees部隊。現在是你的機會去與Kracko Jr及迪迪大王等頭目戰鬥。 透過吸入多名敵人去發動Blaster Bullet，會是一個能推高分數去奪取金、銀、銅星星的好方法。另一個能取得高分數的方法是連續沒有失誤地向敵人噴火去組成一個連擊。進行遊戲同時，你會解開EX關卡 ─ 給你一個更難征服的挑戰。

IT.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
IT.description: Attraversa una serie di livelli colorati in Kirby’s Blowout Blast, un frenetico gioco d’azione in 3D! Combatti in più di 25 livelli creati per essere giocati in mobilità e cerca di ottenere il punteggio più alto possibile. Risucchia tutti i nemici che incontri, poi sputali fuori al momento giusto per abbattere i nemici e accumulare punti! Più nemici abbatti, più potenza di fuoco avrai! Scatena un potente Proiettile esplosivo per eliminare intere ondate di nemici tutte insieme o fai fuori un solo cattivo con un rapido Proiettile stella. Per ottenere un punteggio altro dovrai sfruttare le combo! Partecipa a incredibili scontri con i boss e con famigerati nemici della saga che fanno il loro ritorno. Consulta il sito amiibo.nintendo.eu per maggiori dettagli sugli amiibo™ compatibili e informazioni aggiornate. Per usare gli amiibo con la console Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS è necessario un lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS. Il lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS sarà disponibile quest'anno.

JP.name: カービィのすいこみ大作戦
JP.description: 自由自在に動き回れる3D空間のステージを舞台に、カービィを操作して次々と現れる敵をすいこみ、「星型弾」で倒していくスクロール型の3Dアクションゲームです。 敵をまとめてすいこむと、体の大きな「まんぷくカービィ」になります。強力な「かんつう星型弾」を放つことができるので、敵をまとめてやっつけてコンボを狙い、ハイスコアを目指しましょう。

movies.name: カービィのすいこみ大作戦 紹介映像

MX.name: Kirby’s Blowout Blast™
MX.description: Kirby está listo para la acción en una nueva dimensión… ¡la tercera dimensión! Diviértete en grande absorbiendo enemigos y escupiéndolos en más de 25 niveles. Absorbe suficientes enemigos y lanza un proyectil estelar que dañará a una tropa de Waddle Dees. ¡Esta es tu oportunidad de vencer a icónicos jefes como Kracko Jr. y el Rey Dedede en 3D! Absorber a múltiples enemigos para lanzar un proyectil penetrante es la mejor estrategia para aumentar tu puntuación y obtener monedas de bronce, de plata o de oro. Otra manera de aumentar la puntuación es obtener impactos al dispararles a los enemigos sin fallar. También puedes obtener monedas mientras saltas a través de las plataformas. A medida que progreses en el juego desbloquearás niveles EX que te brindarán un mayor desafío. ¡Celebra tus logros al escanear figuras amiibo™ de la serie de Kirby para construir estatuas y tocar nuevas melodías en la plaza!

NO.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
NO.description: Blast your way through a variety of colourful levels in Kirby’s Blowout Blast, a fast-paced 3D action-puzzler! Fight through over 25 bite-sized stages, perfect for playing on the go, and aim for the highest scores you can muster. Inhale any enemies you encounter, then spit them out when the time is right to bash other bad guys – and rack up the points! The more meanies you inhale, the more firepower you’ll wield! Unleash a powerful Blaster Bullet to wipe out entire troops of wrongdoers all at once, or take out a single foe with a quick fire Star Bullet – you’ll need to chain combos to achieve the highest scores! Experience larger-than-life boss battles, as troublesome fiends from the Kirby universe return to cause havoc. Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

NL.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
NL.description: Beuk door tal van kleurrijke levels in Kirby’s Blowout Blast, een razendsnelle actiegame in 3D. Baan jezelf een weg door 25 hapklare levels, die je gemakkelijk onderweg kunt spelen, en zet een zo hoog mogelijke score neer. Slok de vijanden op die je onderweg tegenkomt, en gebruik te om andere slechteriken mee te bekogelen. Op die manier kun je een hoop punten in de wacht slepen! Hoe meer vijanden je opslokt, hoe groter je vuurkracht wordt. Gebruik een krachtige Blaster Bullet om hele hordes tegenstanders in één klap uit te schakelen, of neem één enkele vijand op de korrel met een Star Bullet. Gebruik combo's om de beste scores te behalen. Laat zien wat je in huis hebt in spectaculaire eindbaasgevechten, want een paar herrieschoppers uit de wereld van Kirby keren terug uit deze game. Kijk op amiibo.nintendo.eu voor compatibele amiibo™ en de meest recente informatie. Om amiibo te gebruiken op Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- en/of Nintendo 2DS-systemen is een NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS nodig. De NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS zal later dit jaar beschikbaar komen.

NZ.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
NZ.description: Blast your way through a variety of colourful levels in Kirby’s Blowout Blast, a fast-paced 3D action-puzzler! Fight through over 25 bite-sized stages, perfect for playing on the go, and aim for the highest scores you can muster. Inhale any enemies you encounter, then spit them out when the time is right to bash other bad guys – and rack up the points! The more meanies you inhale, the more firepower you’ll wield! Unleash a powerful Blaster Bullet to wipe out entire troops of wrongdoers all at once, or take out a single foe with a quick fire Star Bullet – you’ll need to chain combos to achieve the highest scores! Experience larger-than-life boss battles, as troublesome fiends from the Kirby universe return to cause havoc. Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

PL.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
PL.description: Blast your way through a variety of colourful levels in Kirby’s Blowout Blast, a fast-paced 3D action-puzzler! Fight through over 25 bite-sized stages, perfect for playing on the go, and aim for the highest scores you can muster. Inhale any enemies you encounter, then spit them out when the time is right to bash other bad guys – and rack up the points! The more meanies you inhale, the more firepower you’ll wield! Unleash a powerful Blaster Bullet to wipe out entire troops of wrongdoers all at once, or take out a single foe with a quick fire Star Bullet – you’ll need to chain combos to achieve the highest scores! Experience larger-than-life boss battles, as troublesome fiends from the Kirby universe return to cause havoc. Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

PT.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
PT.description: Ao combateres nos mais de 25 cenários do jogo, quantos mais inimigos inalares, mais capacidade de disparos obterás. Aniquila legiões inteiras de inimigos de uma só vez e tenta alcançar a estrela de bronze, prata e ouro! Combate ao longo de 25 cenários curtos, ideais para jogar em qualquer altura e em qualquer lugar, e tenta alcançar a pontuação mais alta que conseguires. Inala quaisquer inimigos que encontrares e cospe-os na altura certa para derrotares os vilões e arrecadares pontos. Quantos mais inimigos inalares, mais capacidade de disparos obterás. Utiliza uma potente Blaster Bullet para aniquilares tropas inteiras de adversários de uma só vez ou elimina um único adversário com uma Star Bullet rápida. Terás de encadear ataques para alcançares a pontuação mais alta! Participa em batalhas com bosses de cortar a respiração e prepara-te para enfrentar famosos inimigos do universo Kirby. Aceda a amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar a lista de amiibo™ compatíveis e as informações mais recentes. Para usar os amiibo com as Consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS, é necessário um leitor/gravador de NFC Nintendo 3DS.

RU.name: Kirby's™ Blowout Blast
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Пробивая себе дорогу на более 25 уровнях, проглатывайте как можно больше врагов, и тогда никто не сможет вас остановить! Сметайте целые отряды врагов за раз и получайте бронзовые, серебряные или золотые звезды. 25 уровней ждут будущих рекордсменов, готовых раскусить неприятеля где и когда угодно.Проглатывайте встреченных плохишей и выплевывайте их в нужный момент, набирая очки! Чем больше злодеев вы проглотите, тем сильнее будет плевок! Сметайте с дороги целые полчища мощным Громовым плевом или влепите быстрый Звездный плевок одному счастливчику. Чередуйте удары, и очки польются рекой! А в конце каждого уровня придется попробовать на зуб одного гигантских боссов из мира Кирби, которые вернулись сеять разрушение. Посетите amiibo.nintendo.eu для получения информации о совместимых amiibo™ и прочей актуальной информации. Чтобы использовать amiibo с системами Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL или Nintendo 2DS, необходимо устройство чтения/записи NFC для Nintendo 3DS.

SI.description: Blast your way through a variety of colourful levels in Kirby’s Blowout Blast, a fast-paced 3D action-puzzler! TW.name: Kirby's Blowout Blast™ (英文版)
TW.description: 卡比準備在全新的三維空間行動! 在橫跨25關卡以上的3D環境下盡情吸入及吹走敵人。吸入足夠的敵人你就可以發動巨大的Blaster Bullet去清除Waddle Dees部隊。現在是你的機會去與Kracko Jr及迪迪大王等頭目戰鬥。 透過吸入多名敵人去發動Blaster Bullet，會是一個能推高分數去奪取金、銀、銅星星的好方法。另一個能取得高分數的方法是連續沒有失誤地向敵人噴火去組成一個連擊。進行遊戲同時，你會解開EX關卡 ─ 給你一個更難征服的挑戰。

US.name: Kirby’s Blowout Blast™
US.description: Kirby is ready for action in a whole different dimension—the third dimension! Have a blast inhaling foes and blowing them away in 3D environments across 25+ stages. Inhale enough enemies and you can launch one huge Blaster Bullet capable of wiping out a troop of Waddle Dees. Now’s your chance to battle iconic bosses like Kracko Jr and King Dedede in 3D! Inhaling multiple enemies to launch Blaster Bullets is a great way to pump up your score and go for a bronze, silver, or gold star. Another way to score big is to rack up a combo by continuously firing at enemies without missing. Or you could always just collect coins as you jump across platforms. As you progress, you’ll unlock EX stages, which provide a tougher challenge to master. Celebrate your victories by tapping a Kirby series amiibo™ figure to build a statue in the plaza that plays new music!
